title: List of Indian targets reported by state media, security sources - DAWN.COM
content:
The following is a list of the targets said to be hit in Pakistan’s ‘Operation Bunyan-um-Marsoos’ against India, as per state media and security sources.

India’s power grid — 70pc inoperative in cyber attack

India’s S-400 system destroyed by PAF’s JF-17’s hypersonic missiles in Adampur

Indian military intelligence’s training centre in IOK’s Rajouri, responsible for orchestrating terrorism in Pakistan

“KG Top” Brigade Headquarters

Uri field supply depot

Adampur, Udhampur, Pathankot, Suratgarh, Sirsa and Bhatinda airfields

Artillery gun position in Dehrangyari

Brahmos storage site in Beas

Akhnoor aviation base
